title: Doomsday Game - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Horror   Mystery   Psychological   Shounen Ai   Supernatural   Yaoi
tags: Amnesia   Amusement Park   Army   Battle Competition   Beasts   Death   Ghosts   Glasses-wearing Love Interests   Gods   Gunfighters   Handsome Male Lead   Manly Gay Couple   Monsters   Post-apocalyptic   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Slow Romance   Soldiers   Strong Love Interests   Strong to Stronger   Survival   Survival Game   System Administrator   Unlimited Flow   Younger Love Interests   Younger Sisters   Zombies

description:
Reborn after death, Lin Yue was involved in a crazy game. Crazy amusement parks, death hunting grounds, ghoul purgatory, giants, plant mutations…

all kinds of apocalypse are coming!

And his only goal is to live well.>
